original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields down at close, rupee at 313/314 against the USD
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s bond yields were down at close on Friday and the rupee closed at 313/314 against the US dollar in the spot market, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 closed at 28.10/25 percent, down from 28.40/60 percent at yesterday’s close.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 was quoted at 29.30/30.00 per cent down from 31.00/25 per cent at last close.
The rupee closed at 313.10/40 against the US dollar in the spot market steady from the last close at 313.00/30. (Colombo/May12/2023
